Class DefaultAbstractAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.context.AbstractContextAction
          gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.jgraph.actions.DefaultAbstractAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddFunctionalBoxAction, ConstantEditAction, GraphDeleteAction
public abstract class DefaultAbstractAction
extends AbstractContextAction

The class is the default action class that will be inherited by other action class in this package.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:04 $
Author:

Field Detail

RCSID

public static java.lang.String RCSID
String that identifies the class version and solves the serial version UID problem. This String is for informational purposes only and MUST not be made final.

See Also:
JBuilder vice javac serial version UID
